news.title: OpenAI, Anthropic and Block join new Linux Foundation effort to standardize the AI agent era
news.summary: Anthropic, Block, and OpenAI  are backing the Linux Foundation’s new Agentic AI Foundation, donating MCP, Goose, and AGENTS.md to standardize AI agents, boost interoperability, and curb proprietary fragmentation.

news.title: Google Photos’ new video editor makes it more like Capcut
news.summary: The Google Photos app on Android and iOS is getting a video editing overhaul with a redesigned editor, templates for highlight reels, and options for adding custom text overlays and music to individual videos. news.title: Data center construction moratorium is gaining steam
news.summary: More than 230 groups including Food & Water Watch, Physicians for Social Responsibility, and Greenpeace are demanding a pause on the construction of any new data centers in the US until stronger regulations are in place to prevent soaring electricity rates, water use, and pollution.
